   •  Total revenue excl. Strategic Commercial Contracts

   •  U.S. revenue

      –  Growth % = (628 – 406)/406 ≈ 54.7% ⇒ **55% Y/Y**

   We have the three numbers: {39%, 44%, 55%}.  
   •  Mean = (39 + 44 + 55)/3 = 46.0%  
   •  Population standard deviation  
      σ = √[Σ(xi – μ)² / 3]

        = √[49 + 4 + 81 ÷ 3]

        ≈ **6.7 pp**  
   •  Sample standard deviation (n–1)  
      s = √[Σ(xi – μ)² / (3–1)] = √[134/2] ≈ **8.2 pp**  

3.  Quarter-over-quarter changes in the Rule of 40 (Q2 ’23 → Q1 ’25)

   •  Population σΔ = √[Σ(Δi – 6.43)²/7] ≈ √[12.24] ≈ **3.5 pp**
